abstract:
In this paper, we discuss notion of ring sum of product interval-valued fuzzy graphs. We
define tensor product of two interval-valued fuzzy graphs and shown that the tensor
product of two product interval-valued fuzzy graphs is a product interval-valued fuzzy
graph. Likewise, given three independent theorems based on ring sum, join and
isomorphism of product interval-valued fuzzy graphs. Finally, we define balanced and
strictly balanced interval-valued fuzzy graphs and investigated several properties.
